resources:
EndGame InitActivity ENDGAME Settings Hello blank fragment HostActivity JoinActivity OK InstructionsActivity GameActivity DialogActivity Hello world! Hosting... Your Gamecode: Back Host A Game Join A Game Instructions Joining... Enter Code Here Submit Instructions: 
 When hosting a game you are given a string of characters, these are connected to a newly created game on our Server. 
 Joining a server requires you to enter another persons gamecode and submitting it. 
 Now you should already be playing the game //dialog Agent Schwartz!
Wir haben ein mission for you!
Ein English agent has been zighted in Schweiz.
Ein technology-institüt haben eine Gruppe Zcientists.
Du musste Extrakte them
Viel Glögg
 Smith! .. Smith! .. Do you copy?
Good.
We got a new one for ya, this time it's in Switzerland!
Theres a group of scientists fortified in a bunker, we need you to extract them ASAP.
Becareful though, before locking themself in they activated the landmines around the facility.
Take care Laddie. Sehr Gut!
Mit der Zcientists in unsere hands, die next step is reicht in front of uz.
Wir haben ein paar Optionen:

A. Ein superserum dat will make unsere soldaten super stärk.

B. Ein Atomspränghovet to blöw up unsere enemiez.

C. Ein neue Missil-prototypen, dat we mit unsere Zcientist massen-produceren kann.

Die valg is deine.
 Good job Smith, i knew we could count on ya.
Alright with the intel we've gotten from the scientist, we already have the next steps planned.
We've got a couple options, we'll let you decide where ya wanna go:

A. The scientist knew about a secret super serum project.

B. We got some intel on a series of nuclear warheads that we'd like you to look at.

C. A new missile prototype has been discovered. Go get it for us. NEIN NEIN NEIN NEIN NEIN NEIN NEIN NEIN
DAS WAR EIN BEFEHL!
Schwarts ich bin really skuffet in dich
ach, oh wëll
Wir must warten und see was die English do next.
 Well shit.
Alright Smith, we'll get them on the next one.
Right now we'll keep a lookout for their next move.
We will have you on standby till then. 
Be ready when we next contact you.
Out....
 You are a secret agent working under the name of "Smith", hired by the British covert ops.
 
 In a world troubled by war you are sent on secret missions, ususally requiring you to extract intel or important items, in an attempt to tip the scales in favor of Britain.
 
 You already know that Nazi Germany have a similarly working unit as the British covert ops, they will most likely try to hinder you and steal the objects of value under your nose. You are a secret agent working under the name of "Schwartz", hired by the Schutzstaffel, the secret nazi police.
 
 In a world troubled by war you are sent on secret missions, ususally requiring you to extract intel or important items, in an attempt to tip the scales in favor of Germany.
 
 You already know that the British army have a similarly covert ops unit, they will most likely try to hinder you and steal the objects of value under your nose. IntroductionActivity
